title: An Artist looks at churches
creator_credit: John Taylor, Edgar H. Anstey and British Transport Films
brief_description: Out of 20,000 churches in Britain the artist John Piper, selects one from each century from Norman times to the present day. He reveals their riches of architecture, decoration, carving, sculpture and stained glass.
creator_credit_for_label: John Taylor, Edgar H. Anstey and British Transport Films
